headline: Politico Gives Vance Campaign Seven Hours Overnight to Respond to Hit Piece
author: Jordan Dixon-Hamilton
sentences:
Vances campaign issued the following statement:
While its unethical that Ryan Lizza waited until 11:40 PM the night before publication to reach out to our campaign for comment, we arent surprised that Tim Ryans Democrat PR team at Playbook would rehash oppo, most of which has already been reported by other outlets during the primary campaign, to distract from Tim Ryans extremist comments endorsing late-term abortion with no restrictions on Fox News last night.

In a response to Playbook after the item was published, the Vance campaign said that most of the information in the book has already been reported by other outlets during the primary campaign.?
Politicos hit piece came two days after Vance secured the GOP nomination for U.S. Senate in Tuesdays Republican primary.

Playbook refuses to run in full pic.twitter.com/hcw0MCtTxx
 Andrew Surabian (@Surabees) May 5, 2022
Politico reportedly sent the Vance campaign a follow up? request for comment over two hours later at 2:00 a.m., according to an email sent from Vances campaign to the news outlet.
According to GOP strategist Andy Surabian, who advises Vances campaign, Politicos request for comment came on Wednesday, shortly before midnight, less than seven hours before the story went live.
In the article, Politico reported that Vances campaign did not respond to a request for comment before publishing the report but pledged to include their statement once they replied.
Vance, Ohios Republican nominee for U.S Senate, on Thursday but did not give the campaign reasonable time to respond and failed to publish their full comment once they did respond.
The Vance campaign did not respond to a request for comment last night, but if they get back to us well include it in Playbook PM later today,? Politicos Ryan Lizza wrote.

There is no excuse for your waiting so long to reach out.?
Vances campaign then sent over a statement for Politico to publish in its PM Playbook, as they promised to do.
Reporter reaches out for comment at 1140 PM for a story that prints at 630 AM,? Surabian tweeted along with screenshots of the campaigns communications with Politico.
However, Politico did not publish the entirety of the Vance campaigns statement, opting instead to publish less than one complete sentence.
Curiously, despite Ryans comments going viral online, Playbook did not find it newsworthy enough to report on this morning.
Politico Playbook ran a hit piece on Vance on Thursday that focused on Vances purported connections to big tech companies.

Playbook refuses to run in full.?
4 part story about the lack of journalistic ethics at Politico Playbook:
1.
Ryan, It is ridiculous that you waited until 11:40PM to reach out to me, expecting a response by 6AM.

Reporter reaches out for comment at 1140 PM for a story that prints at 630 AM
2.
4 part story about the lack of journalistic ethics at Politico Playbook: 1.
Not to mention your follow up? at 2AM,? Vances campaign told Politico.
Politico has had this information for over a week.

Story says JD Vance campaign "did not respond"
3.
Story says JD Vance campaign did not respond? 3.
We send over an on record response 4.

We send over an on record response
4.
This is not a breaking news story.
Politico ran a hit piece on J.D.
Wonder why that is?
